channel.title: [459] Full Runescape Website & Knowledge Base [ALL PAGES]
channel.description:
[i]I am cat spit from Rserver and will verify if a Mod needs.[/i]
Download Link [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/378257610/RuneScape.rar]RapidShare: 1-CLICK Web hosting - Easy Filehosting[/url]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=L7V1H5AV]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=L7V1H5AV[/url]
[ul][*]Entire Knowledge Base (Alot of images) [*]World Map with jars [*]shit like post bag from the hedge (y) [*]Entire hoempage with all images working [*]Only modification was to remove ads [*]screenshots page [*]Downloads page [*]Entire german translation[/ul]
Its the website just before the piety update and the update where Jagex ruined pest control..one of there first "ruining" updates.
Some might argue this was the best time for Runescape :P
